description: 30 diverse prompts for RQ1/RQ2 experiments. Spanning nature, urban, water, and mixed domains.

prompts.text: A peaceful forest at dawn with birdsong and morning mist
A mountain meadow with wildflowers swaying in the wind
A dense jungle with exotic birds calling from the canopy
A foggy morning in the countryside with distant church bells
A sunlit garden with buzzing bees and rustling leaves
A snowy mountain peak under a clear blue winter sky
A field of golden wheat under a warm summer sunset
A quiet woodland path with autumn leaves crunching underfoot
A bustling city street at night with neon lights and traffic
A rainy day in a European city with cobblestone streets
A crowded marketplace with vendors shouting and music playing
A quiet alley in an old town with distant footsteps echoing
A rooftop view of a modern skyline at golden hour
A subway station with trains arriving and commuters rushing
A cafe terrace on a busy boulevard with clinking glasses
An empty parking lot under flickering streetlights at midnight
Ocean waves crashing on a sandy beach at sunset
A calm lake reflecting snow-capped mountains at dawn
A tropical island with turquoise water and palm trees
A river flowing through a rocky canyon with rapids
Rain falling on a pond with ripples spreading across the surface
A fishing boat anchored in a misty harbor at early morning
A waterfall cascading into a lush green pool below
A lighthouse on a cliff during a thunderstorm at night
Children playing in a park fountain on a hot summer day
A desert landscape with sand dunes under a blazing sun
A train crossing a bridge over a deep valley at dusk
A bonfire on a beach with waves and guitar music at night
A hot air balloon floating over a patchwork of farm fields
A stone bridge over a stream in an ancient village at twilight
